title: Riot support not responding?
body: i thought that you guys work 24/7? can u guys respond to REQUEST #23624584. its been 3 days

replies.body:
It looks like your ticket has been answered. We've been pretty flooded with tickets lately, so response times are a bit higher than normal.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Please be patient, it can happen when there are more requests than usual. Posting on the boards won't change anything.
